text: I've toured all the clubs in town and Blackhawk is by far my top choice.  I've enjoyed dining on their new patio after playing the fantastic well kept course.  What a great end to many days for my family and I to watch the sunset over the lake.  The Friday night fresh fish special never disappoints.  I've also enjoyed the service in the golf shop and tips from their pro.
If you get a chance to attend an event here, go!  Bar and dining is like stepping back in time in a good way. Food is delish. Atmosphere is comfortable. I'd have stayed longer!
Their wine dinners are FABULOUS!!!! And the views are stunning.  Love the patio for drinks or dining.
